channel.title: Devops-Tools on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Devops-Tools on Arrans github.io

item.title: johnkerl/miller
item.description: Miller is like awk, sed, cut, join, and sort for name-indexed data such as CSV, TSV, and tabular JSON

item.title: mikefarah/yq
item.description: yq is a portable command-line YAML, JSON, XML, CSV, TOML and properties processor

item.title: saulpw/visidata
item.description: A terminal spreadsheet multitool for discovering and arranging data

item.title: TomWright/dasel
item.description: Select, put and delete data from JSON, TOML, YAML, XML and CSV files with a single tool. Supports conversion between formats and can be used as a Go package.
